page.description: Advances to the target tab pane.

argument.name: target
argument.description: Can be 'first', 'previous', 'next' or 'last' or an explicit tab pane number.

section.description: Target can be 'first', 'previous', 'next' or 'last'. Target can also be an explicit tab pane number. (Applies only to tab objects for which the method for selecting the active tab has been set to 'timer'.)
